TopicTitle: Orbital Survey not working for me....

Articles.Content:
Hi all....

I am running a Vanilla + Engineering Redux install over a stable debian Jessie OS

When I try to perform an orbital survey I got an indication of polar orbit and apoapsis and periapsis conditions, but I am in that orbit.

Here's a screenshot..

Any Ideas?

Greetings

Zeke

The message said it needed an orbit between 60 and 15k KM.

Edited May 29, 2015 by ezequielandrush
you need to have an orbit which doesn't touch the atmosphere to be considered a stable orbit (just a wild guess) and your Pe looks like it's below 70km

my bad. Didn 't know that...

Of course, this is solved. Thanks!
